document.full_text: under legislation approved by the cabinet on wednesday, germans who were sexually abused as children are expected to have as long as 30 years after they turn 21 to bring accusations in court.
document.title: europe: germany: change to abuse statute
lines_and_colors: under legislation approved by the cabinet on wednesday, germans who were sexually abused as children are expected to have as long as 30 years after they turn 21 to bring accusations in court.
